comment: Prof. Allen is an awesome professor. He is extremely passionate about his job as well as his students success. I would highly recommend him for an class he is teaching.
one of the best professor i have worked with.

Very enthusiastic professor about what he teaches and will answer students questions with clarity. Used visual representations to enhance learning about sand castings. You dont have to take his final exam if you make an "A" leading up to it!

An absolutely phenomenal teacher. He truly cares about his students academic progress, as well as their overall well-being. Probably the best teacher that I have encountered so far. I've taken 2 courses with him, and currently work with him for the Georgia BEST Robotics organization as well. Take one of his classes, you won't regret it!!
Excellent professor. Knows his stuff, and makes sure the students are learning in a good pace. Treats everyone respectfully.

A true professional...He prepares students for the real world. Makes the subject interesting. Above all is knowledgeable about his subject matter. Among the best I have ever encountered. After taking one of his classes, you will be a better student for it. He is the man and knows how to get things done...learn from him and you will go far.

Awesome teacher!! He knows what he is talking about. Project was fun and interesting. He gives you a taste of the real world. Attendance is mandatory. It is part of your grade, but if you are serious about your future it shouldn't be a problem. I would highly recommend him!

Hands down one of the best. One of the few people at Southern Poly that understands the needs of students and recognizes why we are getting an education in the first place. Has a good vision for the school. As far as the EG class goes, it was easy and i learned what i was supposed to. I was kinda disappointed it didn't go into more depth.
Good educator, very smart, professional attitude, enthusiastic, able to help, exigent (fair), good attitude.

I loved this class! Awesome teacher he is very helpful and lets you geta  taste of the real world of engineering. His lessons were very helpful and he can aid you in deciding whether or MET is for you. Project was fun! Would definitely recommend again!!!!!
As an MET teacher he is critical at times, however he makes the class interesting.
